name: 李文興
objective:
課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system
schedule:
week 1. C#
week 2. C#
week 3. C#
week 4. Python
week 5. python
week 6. R
week 7. R
week 8. Designing a Workable System
week 9. Economics
week 10. Midterm exam
week 11. Equation Fitting
week 12. Modeling Thermal Equipment
week 13. System Simulation 
week 14. Optimization
week 15. Lagrange Multipliers
week 16. Search Methods
week 17. Dynamic Programming
week 18. Final exam
scorePolicy:
Midterm exam 30%
Final exam 30%
Usual performance 20%
Attendance rate 20%
